title: The Art of Improvisation

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.context: Answering what he's trying to prove with pure spontaneity

scene_context: Evan's declaration of improvisational consciousness captures the fundamental difference between human creativity and computational processing.
narrator_note: "I'm improvising." Two words that capture the essence of human consciousness in its purest form. Improvisation is the antithesis of algorithmic processingâ€”method disguised as chaos, the irreducible spontaneity of consciousness engaged with its own becoming.
